entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
